org.vesselonline.test
Class XmlUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.vesselonline.test.XmlUtils

public class XmlUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Provides XML-related services to the org.vesselonline.test package. Deals primarily with XPath expressions, utilizing the JAXP 1.3 specification.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Steven Handy
See Also:
WebTestRunner, WebSite

Constructor Detail

XmlUtils

public XmlUtils(java.lang.String xmlFile)
         throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                java.io.IOException
Class constuctor, requires a well-formed XML file name on which to base the XML operations provided by this instance. Establishes the DOM Node for the document root and the XPath object needed to provide XPath services to this instance.

Parameters:
xmlFile - The name of a well-formed XML file that will serve as the basis for this instance's operations.
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

getDoc

public org.w3c.dom.Document getDoc()
Returns the DOM Node object representing this instance's XML file.

Returns:
DOM Node as a Document object.

getXPath

public javax.xml.xpath.XPath getXPath()
Returns the XPath object that processes XPath expressions for this instance.

Returns:
XPath object.

getXPathResult

public java.lang.String getXPathResult(java.lang.String expr,
                                       java.lang.Object context)
                                throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
Evaluates an XPath expression against a DOM Node. Used when needing the text content of a specific element or attribute node.

Parameters:
expr - An XPath expression returning an element or attribute node.
context - The context node upon which to apply the XPath expression.
Returns:
The text content of the selected node.
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

getNodeList

public org.w3c.dom.NodeList getNodeList(java.lang.String expr,
                                        java.lang.Object context)
                                 throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
Evaluates an XPath expression against a DOM Node to create a NodeSet. Used when needing a list of child nodes of the context node.

Parameters:
expr - An XPath expression returning zero or more element nodes.
context - The context node upon which to apply the XPath expression.
Returns:
The elements selected by the XPath expression.
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
